DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the efficacy of dutogliptin over 26 weeks (as evidenced by placebo-corrected changes in HbA1c relative to baseline), to demonstrate safety and tolerability of dutogliptin, and to demonstrate changes in fasting plasma glucose over 26 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Dutogliptin/PHX1149T in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus on a Background Medication of Metformin
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, diagnosed at least 4 months prior to Screening (Visit 1) Age 18 to 85 years, inclusive.
